info.headline: Dust Storm Warning issued June 2 at 7:40PM CDT until June 2 at 8:15PM CDT by NWS Goodland KS
info.description:
The National Weather Service in Goodland has issued a
* Dust Storm Warning for... Cheyenne County in northwestern Kansas... Western Rawlins County in northwestern Kansas...
* Until 815 PM CDT.
* At 739 PM CDT, a wall of dust was along a line extending from 8 miles east of Bonny Reservoir to 6 miles southwest of Bird City to 11 miles south of McDonald, moving north at 60 mph.
HAZARD...Less than a quarter mile visibility with damaging wind in excess of 60 mph.
SOURCE...Public report of 1/4 mile visibility in souther Cheyenne county.
IMPACT...Dangerous life-threatening travel.
Highway 36 between the the Colorado Kansas state line to Beardsley, KS
Locations impacted include... St. Francis, Bird City, McDonald, Beardsley, and Wheeler.
info.instruction:
Dust storms lead to dangerous driving conditions with visibility reduced to near zero. If driving, avoid dust storms if possible. If caught in one, pull off the road, turn off your lights and keep your foot off the brake.
Strong to severe thunderstorms are also possible behind this wall of dust. Keep updated with this quickly evolving situation.

parameter.value: NWS: DUST STORM WARNING til 8:15 PM CDT. Be ready for a sudden drop to zero visibility.

National Weather Service: DUST STORM WARNING for this area until 8:15 PM CDT. Be ready for sudden drop to zero visibility. Pull Aside, Stay Alive! When visibility drops, pull far off the road and put your vehicle in park. Turn the lights off and keep your foot off the brake. Infants, the elderly and those with respiratory issues urged to take precautions.

parameter.value: SNM: AVISO DE TORMENTA DE POLVO hasta las 8:15 PM CDT. Espere reduccion de visibilidad.

AVISO DE TORMENTA DE POLVO hasta las 8:15 PM CDT. Estar alerta para una reduccion repentina en visibilidad. Cuando la visibilidad disminuya, mueva su vehiculo fuera de la carretera. Apague las luces y mantenga su pie fuera del freno. Se recomienda enfaticamente el tomar precauciones para los infantes, ancianos y personas con problemas respiratorios.
